item.title: Get A Bar!!! Blogspot Podcast Show
item.description: The Get A Bar blogspot podcast hosted by Lazy-B - The Trap Squad General. This podcast featurs artists & music from the west coast that are also featured on the poular blog Get A Bar!!! Check th podcast and check the blogspot!!!
item.dc:creator: Grand Larceny Radio
item.itunes:summary:
The Get A Bar blogspot podcast hosted by Lazy-B - The Trap Squad General. This podcast featurs artists & music from the west coast that are also featured on the poular blog Get A Bar!!!
Check th podcast and check the blogspot!!!

item.title: Grand Larceny Radio presents Compton City Boy - "The Return"
item.description:
Grand Larceny Radio is back with another "Special Edition" episode showcasing Larceny Entertainment's Compton City Boy. This is "The Return" as we did an earlier Compton City Boy segment that received alot of positive response so we're back again!
Check the episode & holla back!
item.dc:creator: Grand Larceny Radio
item.itunes:summary:
Grand Larceny Radio is back with another "Special Edition" episode showcasing Larceny Entertainment's Compton City Boy. This is "The Return" as we did an earlier Compton City Boy segment that received alot of positive response so we're back again!
Check the episode & holla back!

item.title: Grand Larceny Radio presents - The Collabo's
item.description: This podcast showcases the collaborative efforts of Silkk Calone & City Boy together!!! Larceny's brightest artists have been heavy in the lab and we decided to give y'all a sneak peek into what they've created!!!! A group project is imminent!!! Check the joints!

A group project is imminent!!! Check the joints!

item.title: Grand Larceny Radio presents: The Best of Larceny Edition
item.description: Right in time for Memorial Day weekend.. Exclusive new shit from the entire L-Gang with some guest appearances from Akon, DJ Khalil & more! Bang this for your Memorial Day weekend & be a Star In Ya Hood!!!
item.dc:creator: Grand Larceny Radio
item.itunes:summary:
Right in time for Memorial Day weekend.. Exclusive new shit from the entire L-Gang with some guest appearances from Akon, DJ Khalil & more!
Bang this for your Memorial Day weekend & be a Star In Ya Hood!!!

item.title: Grand Larceny Radio DJ Hustler "L-Gang" edition
item.description: Bang!!!! We back with another episode... this L-Gang exclusive podcast was put together by the homie DJ Hustler!! Hustler put it down with all new music from the Larceny Gang: Young Hootie, Silkk Calone & City Boy. You already know what it is!!! It's the L-Ggggggang!!
item.dc:creator: Grand Larceny Radio
item.itunes:summary: Bang!!!! We back with another episode... this L-Gang exclusive podcast was put together by the homie DJ Hustler!! Hustler put it down with all new music from the Larceny Gang: Young Hootie, Silkk Calone & City Boy. You already know what it is!!! It's the L-Ggggggang!!

item.title: Grand Larceny Radio #4
item.description: Another bangin episode of Grand Larceny Radio for you Larceny fans out there... we gon continue to bring you the best and brightest from the west coast music scene... South Central to the Bay Area!!! Do remember... "It Aint Authentic, If We Aint In It"
item.dc:creator: Grand Larceny Radio
item.itunes:summary:
Another bangin episode of Grand Larceny Radio for you Larceny fans out there... we gon continue to bring you the best and brightest from the west coast music scene... South Central to the Bay Area!!!
Do remember... "It Aint Authentic, If We Aint In It"

item.title: Grand Larceny Radio Episode #3
item.description: This is another throwback of Grand Larceny Radio from the days with mixtapeshow.net. Like I said we still fuck wit Dex Digi so it's all good... shit we bouncing pod shows back & forth to make sure ya'll get the very best of what we have to offer!!! Even tho this is a throwback... it's new to ya'll here on podomatic so Get A Bar!!!! Stay tuned... Grand Larceny... as we procede!!!!

Stay tuned... Grand Larceny... as we procede!!!!

item.title: DJ Hustler's "Hustla Radio" Vol. 1
item.description: Here's a new DJ Hustler segment: "Hustla Radio" Vol. 1 featuring the hottest music from all over the country!!! Grand Larceny Radio will continue to bring you the hottest shit this side of the planet!!! From France to LAX & Back!!! Get A Bar!!!!!

item.title: *New* Soultronica episode presented by Dex Digi
item.description: Dex Digi from Mixtape Show dot net provided this hot Soultronica episode. We bounce episodes back & forth between us two, just 'cause we down like that! This Soultronic experience features Steve Spacek, Sa-Ra, Kenny Keys, J*Davey, DJ Spinner and more!!! Larceny Ent... we are black music!!!!
item.dc:creator: Grand Larceny Radio
item.itunes:summary:

Larceny Ent... we are black music!!!!

item.title: The LA Riots!!!
item.description: Larceny Ent brings you the "La Riots" Edition of Grand Larceny Radio... this shit is powerful so get a bar!!!! As only Larceny Ent can give it to you... live & direct from the streets of LA!!!!
item.dc:creator: Grand Larceny Radio
item.itunes:summary:
Larceny Ent brings you the "La Riots" Edition of Grand Larceny Radio... this shit is powerful so get a bar!!!!
As only Larceny Ent can give it to you... live & direct from the streets of LA!!!!

item.title: Black TK & M. Breezy "The Hustlers Manual"
item.description: Black TK & M. Breezy drop "The Hustlers Manual" a body of "niggavational" speeches if you will!!! This is a new millinieum version of Lightning Rod's "The Hustlers Convention" just more attainable for niggaz thats in the streets trying to get it! This is modern day negro spiritual propaganda... Imagine Iceberg Slim, Donald Goines, Gil Scott Heron, Bishop Don Juan, The Last Poets & Too Short on the corner of Central & Main.... Be careful, the contents of this podcast have caused these various symptoms... the ideology of Boss'N Up, the mentality to Get Money, handling your Business, enhanced thinking, street motivation & corporate hustle!!!! Get A Bar!!!
item.dc:creator: Grand Larceny Radio

item.title: Grand Larceny Radio "DJ Hustla Next Episode"
item.description: Yo we told ya'll when we hit the podcast world, we would hit it big!!! Well we are 'Doin It Movin" with our international DJ connect... DJ Hustler... DJ Hustler will be droppin his radio show direct through the Grand Larceny portal... So check him out... The "Next Episode" show features music from Problem, K-Acktive, Bangloose & more.... Make sure you stay tuned & subscribe... and spread the word!!!! Get A Bar!!!!

item.title: Young Hootie 'The Culmination
item.description: Grand Larceny Radio is back with it's Special Edition podcast ft. Young Hootie. As you may, or may not know.... Young Hootie just dropped his new mixtape "The Culmination" which is getting crazy response both on the streets and on the internet. At 23 songs deep.. the mixtape is full of bangers!!! Well this "special edition" podcast features all new tracks not featured on the mixtape... Get A Bar & peep the Grand Larceny Podcast YOUNG HOOTIE EDITION

item.title: Grand Larceny "Will Blast" interview
item.description: Get A Bar as Grand Larceny Radio interviews Will Blast... The voice behind the infamous Strong Arm Steady mixtapes... Will Blast now steps into his own light with "The Blast Report" and a host of other ventures that will amke him a player to watch on the West Coast....

item.title: Grand Larceny Radio ft. CITY BOY
item.description: Grand Larceny Radio "Special Edition" feat. CITY BOY.... This is the 2nd installment of the "Special Edition" podcast where we premiere a specific artist music for the entire podcast.... enjoy... Compton's CITY BOY the Hood Affiliate
